name: Creator Monitor + Transcripts
description: Single job that checks creator feeds and pulls transcripts from new uploads. No chaining needed.

payload.message:
Use yoinkit to check for new uploads from these creators:
- YouTube: @MrBeast, @mkbhd, @ali-abdaal
- TikTok: @garyvee

For each creator, pull their recent feed. For anything posted in the last 24 hours:
1. Note the title, view count, and URL
2. Pull the transcript
3. Summarize the video in 3-4 bullet points (main topic, key takeaways, hooks used)
4. Suggest one content idea I could create in response

If no new uploads, just say so.
